languages.text: {n}Дрожащей рукой вы тянетесь к воксу и требуете прислать сервитора: вы под страхом гибели больше не прикоснетесь к этому предмету. Остается лишь дождаться, когда безмозглый автоматон прибудет и, подобрав проклятый артефакт, отправится в ближайшую шлюзовую камеру и затем — в пустоту.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Дрожащей рукой вы тянетесь к воксу и требуете прислать сервитора: вы под страхом гибели у больше не прикоснетесь к этому предмету. Остается лишь дождаться, когда безмозглый автоматон прибудет и, подобрав проклятый артефакт, отправится в ближайшую шлюзовую камеру и затем в пустоту.{/n}

languages.text: {n}You would rather die than touch that thing again, so you reach a shaking hand for your vox and call for a servitor. Now you just have to wait for the mindless automaton to arrive, pick up the cursed artefact, and head for the nearest airlock to be claimed by the void.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Дрожащей рукой вы тянетесь к воксу и требуете прислать сервитора: вы под страхом гибели больше не прикоснетесь к этому предмету. Остается лишь дождаться, когда безмозглый автоматон прибудет и, подобрав проклятый артефакт, отправится в ближайшую шлюзовую камеру и затем — в пустоту.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}You reach your shaking hand to the vox and ask to send you a servitor: you will never touch this thing again even if it means your death. Now you just have to wait until this brainless automaton arrives, picks up this damn artefact, heads to the nearest lock chamber, and takes it into the void.{/n}

{n}You reach your shaking hand to the vox and ask to send you a servitor: you will never touch this thing again even if it means your death. Now you just have to wait until this brainless automaton arrives, picks up this damn artefact, heads to the nearest lock chamber, and takes it into the void.{/n}

{n}You reach a shaking hand for your vox and ask for a servitor: touching that thing again would surely kill you. Now you just have to wait for the mindless automaton to arrive, pick up the damned artefact, and head for the nearest airlock to cast it into the void.{/n}

{n}You reach a shaking hand for your vox and ask for a servitor: touching that thing again would surely kill you. Now you just have to wait for the mindless automaton to arrive, pick up the damned artefact, and head for the nearest airlock to cast it into the void.{/n}

{n}You would rather die than touch that thing again, so you reach a shaking hand for your vox and call for a servitor. Now you just have to wait for the mindless automaton to arrive, pick up the cursed artefact, and head for the nearest airlock to be claimed by the void.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你宁可死，也不想再碰那个东西了。你用颤抖的手拿起音阵通话器，请求机仆帮忙。现在，你只需等待无意识的自动仆从走来，拿起那件受诅咒的造物，然后前往最近的气闸，将它抛入虚空。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You would rather die than touch that thing again, so you reach a shaking hand for your vox and call for a servitor. Now you just have to wait for the mindless automaton to arrive, pick up the cursed artefact, and head for the nearest airlock to be claimed by the void.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你宁可死，也不想再碰那个东西了。你用颤抖的手拿起音阵通话器，请求机仆帮忙。现在，你只需等待无意识的自动仆从走来，拿起那件受诅咒的造物，然后前往最近的气闸，将它抛入虚空。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Plutôt mourir que de toucher à nouveau cette chose ; vous tendez une main tremblante en direction de votre vox pour appeler un servitor. Il ne vous reste plus qu'à attendre que l'automate arrive, ramasse l'artefact maudit et file vers le sas le plus proche afin de l'éjecter dans le vide.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You would rather die than touch that thing again, so you reach a shaking hand for your vox and call for a servitor. Now you just have to wait for the mindless automaton to arrive, pick up the cursed artefact, and head for the nearest airlock to be claimed by the void.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Plutôt mourir que de toucher à nouveau cette chose ; vous tendez une main tremblante en direction de votre vox pour appeler un servitor. Il ne vous reste plus qu'à attendre que l'automate arrive, ramasse l'artefact maudit et file vers le sas le plus proche afin de l'éjecter dans le vide.{/n}

languages.text: {n}震える手で通信機に手を伸ばし、サーヴィターを呼び出す。あれにもう一度触れたら間違いなく死ぬ。今は心無き機械が到着し、呪われたアーティファクトを拾い上げ、近くのエアロックから虚空に放逐するのを待つだけだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You would rather die than touch that thing again, so you reach a shaking hand for your vox and call for a servitor. Now you just have to wait for the mindless automaton to arrive, pick up the cursed artefact, and head for the nearest airlock to be claimed by the void.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}震える手で通信機に手を伸ばし、サーヴィターを呼び出す。あれにもう一度触れたら間違いなく死ぬ。今は心無き機械が到着し、呪われたアーティファクトを拾い上げ、近くのエアロックから虚空に放逐するのを待つだけだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Preferirías morir antes que tocar esa cosa otra vez, así que con mano temblorosa llamas a un servidor por el voco. Ahora solo queda esperar a que el autómata sin mente venga, se lleve el maldito artefacto y lo tire al vacío por la esclusa más cercana.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You would rather die than touch that thing again, so you reach a shaking hand for your vox and call for a servitor. Now you just have to wait for the mindless automaton to arrive, pick up the cursed artefact, and head for the nearest airlock to be claimed by the void.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Preferirías morir antes que tocar esa cosa otra vez, así que con mano temblorosa llamas a un servidor por el voco. Ahora solo queda esperar a que el autómata sin mente venga, se lleve el maldito artefacto y lo tire al vacío por la esclusa más cercana.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du würdest lieber sterben, als dieses Ding erneut anzufassen, daher greifst du mit zittriger Hand nach deinem Vox und rufst nach einem Servitor. Nun musst du nur noch warten, bis der tumbe Automat eintrifft, das verfluchte Artefakt aufhebt und zur nächsten Luftschleuse geht, um sich und das Artefakt der Leere zu übergeben.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You would rather die than touch that thing again, so you reach a shaking hand for your vox and call for a servitor. Now you just have to wait for the mindless automaton to arrive, pick up the cursed artefact, and head for the nearest airlock to be claimed by the void.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du würdest lieber sterben, als dieses Ding erneut anzufassen, daher greifst du mit zittriger Hand nach deinem Vox und rufst nach einem Servitor. Nun musst du nur noch warten, bis der tumbe Automat eintrifft, das verfluchte Artefakt aufhebt und zur nächsten Luftschleuse geht, um sich und das Artefakt der Leere zu übergeben.{/n}

languages.text: {n}O şeye bir daha dokunmaktansa ölmeyi tercih edersin. Titremekte olan elinle voksuna uzanıyor ve hizmetör çağırıyorsun. Şimdi tek yapman gereken; akılsız otomatonun gelmesini beklemek, lanet eseri aldırmak ve en yakın hava kilidinden uçsuza atmak.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You would rather die than touch that thing again, so you reach a shaking hand for your vox and call for a servitor. Now you just have to wait for the mindless automaton to arrive, pick up the cursed artefact, and head for the nearest airlock to be claimed by the void.{/n}
